resources.string: This common alpaca\'s favorite pastime is eating grass and being fluffy
This alpaca can be found scaling the sheer cliffs of the Himalayas, sometimes it falls off...
This mythical alpaca resides in the Irish forest and is a heavy drinker of Guinness BONUS: Winning this alpaca brings you extra luck for the week!
This alpaca enjoys software development and singing in her college alpaca-pella group
The illusive Sun Paca is in constant pain due to the fact it is half plant, half flesh
This alpaca enjoys shooting other alpacas with love-potion laced arrows and watching what happens BONUS: If this alpaca spits on you, you will fall in love with the next person you see
The Pride Paca is a well-known alpactivist. It enjoys leading parades and knitting rainbow flags
A superhero of alpaca-kind, this mysterious creature was once a spider until they were bitten by a radioactive alpaca
This alpaca is known to become stuck in chimneys due to its colossal amounts of fur BONUS: If you are lucky, it will leave a pile of grass in your house
This alpaca\'s favorite food is Milky Way bars, and surprisingly it hates Galaxy chocolate
This alpaca remains cheerful despite the constant fear of being mistaken for food by a small child
This dangerous alpaca prefers its carrot juice shaken, not stirred BONUS: The true identity of this alpaca is yet to be uncovered, but some stipulate they are the human spy, James Bond
This alpaca is unable to put its tongue inside its mouth, and is thus in a perpetual blep
It is understandable that this alpaca can be found spontaneously developing mobile applications BONUS: Proficient in Java, Kotlin, Javascript, Llamascript, C, C++
A popular salty and cheesy dish that is often eaten by other very hungary alpacas WARNING: This alpaca is known to resent food puns about its motherland, Hungary
This is not an alpaca, it is a llama
